# /!\ THIS IS AN EXAMPLE FILE /!\
# Do not edit this file directly!
# Instead, copy this groups.default.txt to groups.txt
# and edit the list below!

# SteamIDs look like this:
#   STEAM_X:Y:ZZZZZZZZZZ   (where X, Y and Z are numbers)

# groups are defined in the permissions(.default).txt

----------------------------------------------------------

# nBAM Group List
# Add one 'SteamID | group' pair per line:

STEAM_0:1:30490065 | owner				# Example Entry
